titles.title: To reduce the column 1-general rate of duty on piperonyl butoxide (PBO).

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 5/19/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to reduce the column one duty rate on piperonyl butoxide (PBO).
